Term.Name: DirectSpeakers
Term.Definition: For channel-based audio, where each channel feeds a speaker directly
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project

Term.Name: Matrix
Term.Definition: For channel-based audio where channels are matrixed together, such as Mid-Side, Lt/Rt
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project

Term.Name: Objects
Term.Definition: For object-based audio where channels represent audio objects (or parts of objects), so include positional information
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project

Term.Name: HOA
Term.Definition: For scene-based audio where Ambisonics and HOA are used
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project

Term.Name: Binaural
Term.Definition: For binaural audio, where playback is over headphones
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project

Term.Name: User Custom
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project
